notes.title: task 1
notes.text: Add, mark as Done and remove a note from the main page

notes.title: task 2
notes.text: Edit notes on a separate page

notes.title: task 3
notes.text: Find a note by name or text inside

notes.title: task 4
notes.text: Load notes by HTTP request (you can mock JSON with notes using any npm package like json-server)

notes.title: task 5
notes.text: Ability to archive your note and rearchive it back from Archive page of your app
